title: SafeCircle — Parental Control App
description: An advanced parental control application enabling parents to monitor and manage their child's iPhone usage.
highlights: Developed the entire parental control ecosystem using SwiftUI
Integrated Family Controls for managing restrictions (app/web blocking, screen time)
Implemented real-time tracking using Core Location and geofencing alerts

title: JOJO OTT — Gujarati Entertainment Platform
description: A premium regional entertainment platform offering 1000+ hours of movies, shows, and events.
highlights: Revamped UI/UX of Events Module and integrated ticket booking flow
Implemented state management and API integration in the critical Auth Module
Managed project workflows and coordinated with multi-functional teams

title: FanCall — Video Calling Platform
description: A social platform enabling creators to connect with followers through secure, one-on-one video calls.
highlights: Implemented video calling workflows and built scheduling & authentication modules
Ensured smooth, low-latency calling experience through optimized handling

title: Andalus — Electronics E-Commerce App
description: An e-commerce application for browsing and purchasing electronic products.
highlights: Structured end-to-end user flow from search to checkout
Integrated secure payment with Apple Pay using the Ottu API
Designed modern e-commerce UI interactions using UIKit
